casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeremy Dushane MURRELL. No. 484A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney for State of NC. Paul Green, Durham, for Jeremy Dushane Murrell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2007 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
